title: What is your favorite Elementalist Lux skin [POLL]
body:
[](https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4-Hn6zNAS_k/WB0CTejanGI/AAAAAAAA_mw/g6-VfgIx5Ucb2P-mUoeUclarmDjX7pVFACLcB/s640/LUX.jpg)
http://pre11.deviantart.net/7c88/th/pre/f/2016/366/2/d/the_last_singed__lol__by_snook_8-datqhhm.png
**These naive oafs! They practically worship their young Demacian goddess and, in doing so, overlook actual chemistry!**

~~Ok, so hopefully Draven doesn't take over this thread again because that was annoying. :(~~
**You actually believe she's an elementalist? She just flings colored light at people!**

~~Anyway, like last time, just vote on what your favorite Elementalist Lux skin is! >^.^<~~
**This is going too far, time to show people what _actual_ elements are!**

http://www.middlebury.net/op-ed/periodic-table.jpg

**Much better, alright, I'm out.**
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-o-EYnsac-kQ/WK5ccv-UodI/AAAAAAAAehU/n7Rf1p8udb8BCiBWdSPTlt1YXUlJxEiIwCLcB/s1600/singed.gif

replies.body: Well first element should be sodium of course, and then second should be chloride, turning her into the embodiment of League.
EXACTLY!  Someone gets it!  (Everyone else keeps putting Sodium and expecting an explosive metal to be salt.)

> [{quoted}](name=Fate Fire,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=x1VUMfny,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-22T03:17:55.306+0000)
>
> No aluminum? Pass.

you are so beautiful miss Fate Fire
Sodium, of course! The NaCl compund involving Sodium, to be more specific!
So it's a final form!  (Because Sodium and Chlorine Lux are primary elements, and Sodium Chloride is a compound.)  Awesome.
You forgot mercury Lux!

Awkward moment when a word has multiple definitions.

I prefer Uranium Lux

Wait... If we are using these kind of elements. She can't be named Lux, as we are lacking photons in this department.

Where the fuck is Titanium Lux?  I want my heavy metal ~~waifu!~~

What, you though this fleshy bitch was really gonna be mah waifu?  That goes to Orianna.  What, I got a thing for robots.
WHAT ABOUT SALTY LUX
'All these elements and you choose to be salty' {{champion:99}}
just my thought upon posting
Sodium
Erm ... Sodium AND Chloride.
That would be when you combine Sodium Lux and Chlorine Lux.
What Taliyah said, and personality is a factor too.  Sodium Lux wouldn't be a tsundere, she'd just hate you.
Where is Astatine lux?
In the future when they allow more than 10 options for a Poll.
Sodium Chlorine please.
Give me my Krypton lux

Please.

Platinum Lux or bust.
Well which is the most toxic? otherwise i'm going for salty lux.
arsenic but it isn't here
Phosphorus will kill you.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GD6qtc2_AQA/maxresdefault.jpg
Helium of course! Can you imagine her voice and her laugh on helium?! Good god....
da fack

You might have to see this one first to completely get it.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/MXyhJaOr-whats-your-favorite-elementalist-lux-skin-poll
huh, some how I am both surprised and unsurprised that Sodium Lux has the most votes .__.
Because people are confusing it for Sodium Chloride Lux, the element of Salt.
I wanna hear Lux on helium
Erm ... the laugh just got a million times worse.
Helium. Reassign q, w, e, r, d, f to /L = instawin.
Where is cesium? I want my water contact explosives!
Ahh, I got baited :(
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

All these elements, of course I choose to be salty.
(Sodium Lux ftw)

Lead.

https://i.redd.it/xp5ztqjtyamy.jpg
